_source.short_desc: Check patient insurance eligibility in real-time and streamline patient check-in with our software for kiosk, tablet and mobile.
_source.long_desc: Clearwave is the premiere self-service check-in solution for the medical industry. Clearwave enables fast, flexible and effective patient check-in experiences while improving practice economics and performance. With proven ROI and real-time eligibility verification, Clearwave provides healthcare practices with a comprehensive check-in solution, available on kiosk, tablet or mobile to improve insurance verification, increase revenue collections, reduce denied claims and improve data access.

category_features.name: Digital Signature
category_features.definition: Encryption secures data associated with a signed document and helps verify the authenticity of a signed record

category_features.name: Onsite Printing
category_features.definition: Print tickets, receipts, and other information on location

category_features.name: Order Fulfillment
category_features.definition: Process of taking, organizing, tracking and fulfilling purchase requests for a company's products or services

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Control system behavior and appearance, and access and report on system status/health from a distant location

category_features.name: Secure Browsing
category_features.definition: Allow or block access to specific domains and individual pages

category_features.name: Touch Screen
category_features.definition: Interact with the software by touching screens of the devices where it is installed

category_features.name: Usage Tracking/Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and interpret metrics on the usage of application or campaign performance

category_features.name: Virtual Keyboard
category_features.definition: On-screen keyboard that can be used without the need for physical keys/keyboard

category_features.name: Wireless Internet Access
category_features.definition: Internet connection through a wireless network without cables or wires

category_features.name: Point of Sale (POS)
category_features.definition: Accept and process financial transactions

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: Claims Management
category_features.definition: Automates the entire process of creating and submitting claims.

category_features.name: Claims Scrubbing
category_features.definition: Clean up of claims prior to their submission, while validating to determine claims are appropriate and accurate

category_features.name: Code & Charge Entry
category_features.definition: Assigning monetary value to patients' accounts as per medical codes and appropriate fee schedule.

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Insurance Eligibility Verification
category_features.definition: Checking eligibility of patients for different insurance claims.

category_features.name: Invoice History
category_features.definition: Store and view prior invoices for each account/client

category_features.name: Practice Management
category_features.definition: Managing day-to-day operations of a medical practice such as scheduling appointments, generating reports and more.

category_features.name: Quotes/Estimates
category_features.definition: Generate quotes and estimates forms to send to customers

category_features.name: Remittance Advice
category_features.definition: Document insurance payer providing an explanation of benefits (EOB).

category_features.name: Appointment Scheduling
category_features.definition: Book appointments via calendar

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and Drag and drop through an interface

category_features.name: Faculty/Staff Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage faculty/staff information and schedules

category_features.name: HIPAA Compliant
category_features.definition: Compliant with HIPAA, which sets standards for sensitive patient data protection

category_features.name: Multi-Location
category_features.definition: Business with more than one location/store

category_features.name: No-Show Tracking
category_features.definition: Track and monitor patient no-show rates

category_features.name: On Call Scheduling
category_features.definition: Track and organize on-call shifts

category_features.name: Patient Records Management
category_features.definition: Consolidate all patient clinical and billing information in one place

category_features.name: Physician Management
category_features.definition: Track and organize physician schedules and pertinent information

category_features.name: Recurring Appointments
category_features.definition: Schedule repeating appointments based on a duration of time

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

related_products.short_desc: Perfect for selling in-store or on-the-go, our iPad Kiosk offers unrivaled flexibility and control.
related_products.features:
Perfect for selling in-store or on-the-go, our iPad Kiosk offers unrivaled flexibility and control. Complete with multi-award-winning EPOS software, it allows business owners to manage their inventory, sales, staff, and customer relationships all from the convenience of a portable tablet.

Our iPad EPOS system includes POS Software, an Apple iPad Stand, Cash Drawer, and Thermal Receipt Printer. You also have the option to add your own iPad or add a 10.2" iPad to your bundle.

related_products.short_desc: Miradore is a cloud-based MDM / UEM platform that provides a smarter way to securely manage Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows devices.
related_products.features:
Miradore's Kiosk mode is a powerful feature for any company or organization looking to improve ensure that their devices are always used correctly, it is especially useful when some of your devices are only used for certain tasks or have multiple users, such as your customers.

Devices in Kiosk mode are often used as Point of Sale (POS) terminals or info screens, but can also be use for other tasks such as delivery tracking or monitoring inventory.

Getting started is simple and free.

related_products.short_desc: Centralizes the control & management of corporate-owned Android & iOS devices by locking them into Kiosk Lockdown Mode.
related_products.features: Scalefusion (formerly MobiLock Pro) Kiosk lockdown software aids the IT admins in securing and managing corporate-owned Android, iOS & Windows 10 devices over the air through a cloud-based dashboard. With Scalefusion, you can configure apps & websites to be allowed on the devices, block gaming, social media & entertainment apps to improve productivity & lock the devices strictly to business-use.

related_products.short_desc: Lock your Android smartphone or tablet to a single URL in a secure browser, a single app or a handful of applications of your choice.
related_products.features: Lockdown your devices with Hexnode kiosk and securely manage your endpoints directly from the console. Hexnode kiosk is supported on iOS, Android, Windows and Apple TVs. It allows you to restrict your devices either to a single app or a handful of essential apps based on the requirement. Turning your devices into a kiosk is a considerably simple task. Simply log in to the portal and set up appropriate policies to activate kiosk mode and additional functionalities.

related_products.short_desc: Feature rich and easy to use NoviSign is a Saas-based digital signage software that runs on Chrome OS, Android and Windows.
related_products.features: NoviSign is known for RELIABILITY & EASE OF USE! Includes over 20 drag and drop widgets; HD videos, dynamic slideshows, weather, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, RSS, virtual queue, website integration, interactive polls and more. NoviSign also includes a complete real-time monitoring dashboard for easy tracking of screens/media players. Proof play reports, live online connectivity, and more. Price starts at on $20/month and includes full support and training. Runs on Chrome OS, Android, & Windows!

related_products.short_desc: A modern mobile management software that enables businesses to easily secure, deploy and manage mobile apps & data on various devices.
related_products.features: A modern enterprise mobility management software that enables businesses to easily secure, deploy and manage mobile applications and corporate data on company-owned and employee-owned (BYOD) mobile devices. Codeproof offers an integrated BYOD security and mobile management platform built on top of Amazon's elastic cloud stack for maximum scalability and security. Product feature include MDM, MAM, Enterprise AppStore, Mobile Kiosk, Data usage monitoring and Geofencing solutions.

related_products.short_desc: Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management team
related_products.features:
Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management teams worldwide. Founded in 1996, eShow has helped Event Managers run thousands of events worldwide with tasks including registration, mobile apps, event websites, RFID, badge printing, abstract collection and so much more! 

When you choose the eShow product(s) that fit your needs, you tap into a powerful engine that no single-function supplier can hope to match.

related_products.short_desc: Moki Total Control enables you to quickly and easily manage all of your Android, iOS and BrightSign devices at scale.
related_products.features: Moki is a specialized MDM solution for customer-facing iOS, Android and BrightSign devices. Our SaaS platform was specifically designed to simplify the deployment and management of single-purpose, multi-user solutions. Moki makes installing, updating or deleting applications and profiles so simple that anyone can do it.  Fully remote control, app lockdown, custom alerting, no-touch deployments, event scheduling, SDK and API integrations and more, make managing all of your devices simple.

related_products.short_desc: Introducing the first ever Kiosk as a Service (KaaS) digital concierge platform that you can get up and running in minutes.
related_products.features:
Introducing the first ever Kiosk as a Service (KaaS) concierge platform that you can get up and running in minutes. 

Get the edge and save costs in serving your customers, travelers, students or visitors. Great for building lobbies, educational institutions, visitor centers, transportation centers, hotels, hospitals or for your common spaces.

And the best part, no software development, no headaches. Plus, soon to be ad-supported in your city.

Schedule a FREE ON-SITE trial now.

related_products.short_desc: KioWare is kiosk mode software that secures the OS, desktop, and browser, and can also provide kiosk management from a central server.
related_products.features: KioWare is fully customizable kiosk software with a product line ranging from basic browser-lockdown to server based remote monitoring. KioWare works by wrapping around existing browser-based applications, securing the OS (Windows or Android) and browser, and allowing users to access only your application.  Kiosk Management options range from self hosted and KioWare hosted options (KioWare Server & KioCloud).  Free fully functioning trial.

related_products.short_desc: Easy, web-based interface. On premise server or cloud options. Option to use your own hardware. Over 120 apps.  Free 30 day trial.
related_products.features:
UCView combines a simple user interface with flexible features and an extensive library of easy to use widgets and templates. Our software allows you to deliver your digital signage message to any TV or display simply and professionally. Individually control each screen or control as groups from cloud or locally stored CMS. 

UCView also comes complete with its own integrated IPTV platform, allowing you to entertain as well as inform your audience.

similar_products.short_desc: Lock your Android smartphone or tablet to a single URL in a secure browser, a single app or a handful of applications of your choice.
similar_products.features: Lockdown your devices with Hexnode kiosk and securely manage your endpoints directly from the console. Hexnode kiosk is supported on iOS, Android, Windows and Apple TVs. It allows you to restrict your devices either to a single app or a handful of essential apps based on the requirement. Turning your devices into a kiosk is a considerably simple task. Simply log in to the portal and set up appropriate policies to activate kiosk mode and additional functionalities.

similar_products.features: Scalefusion (formerly MobiLock Pro) Kiosk lockdown software aids the IT admins in securing and managing corporate-owned Android, iOS & Windows 10 devices over the air through a cloud-based dashboard. With Scalefusion, you can configure apps & websites to be allowed on the devices, block gaming, social media & entertainment apps to improve productivity & lock the devices strictly to business-use.

similar_products.short_desc: ConnectedSign provides interactive digital signage and kiosk software, hardware, content, system management, training, and support.
similar_products.features: ConnectedSign's virtual concierge and interactive kiosks solutions give end-users access to on-demand information.  Create multi-level maps for wayfinding, provide information about meetings, events, activities, restaurants, guest/employee check-in/out, and more.  The platform can be centrally managed and integrates with your existing event management system, GDS, social media, and other industry specific software.  The CMS software supports interactive displays, desktop, and mobile devices.

similar_products.short_desc: Completely lock down your devices with Esper's kiosk mode - leveraging single-app, multi-app, and custom configurations.
similar_products.features: Esper is the first full stack solution for enterprise-grade kiosks across industries such as retail restaurants, healthcare, logistics, education, and more. With the ability to completely lock down your device, you can leverage single-app, multi-app, and custom configurations to transform your hardware into purpose-built devices that meet your unique business case.

similar_products.short_desc: ManageEngine Mobile Device Manager Plus is an Enterprise Mobile Device Management software to manage your iOS, Android & Windows device
similar_products.features:
ManageEngine Mobile Device Manager Plus is an Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) solution that gives enterprises the ability to harness the power of mobility.
 
Improve employee productivity without compromising on enterprise security with features like mobile device management, application management, email management and device containerization.
 
Available as both an on premise as well as a cloud offering, MDM has been developed keeping user demands and IT security requirements in mind.

similar_products.short_desc: Perfect for selling in-store or on-the-go, our iPad Kiosk offers unrivaled flexibility and control.
similar_products.features:
Perfect for selling in-store or on-the-go, our iPad Kiosk offers unrivaled flexibility and control. Complete with multi-award-winning EPOS software, it allows business owners to manage their inventory, sales, staff, and customer relationships all from the convenience of a portable tablet.

similar_products.short_desc: 22Miles easy to use CMS allows administrators to control, define, & manage customizable content displayed in kiosks and other screens.
similar_products.features:
22Miles content management system Publisher Pro.AioT, allows administrators to easily control, define, and customize content displayed in kiosks and other digital screens. 

22Miles' solution is ideal for all levels of users from novices to pro-level. With a host of integrated options including interactive wayfinding, & secure mobile control which allows users to scan a QR code & control digital signage & kiosk screens, creating a unique, interactive immersive experience has never been simpler.

similar_products.short_desc: ReflectView, now part of Creative Realities, offers an end-to-end digital solution with a software and service model built to scale.
similar_products.features: ReflectView joined forces with Creative Realities in 2022 to become a powerhouse in the digital signage world with end-to-end solutions built to scale. As a newly combined unit, Creative Realities wraps best-in-class proprietary software around in-house services and support from content creation, analytics, procurement and installation and "Day 2" support. We've helped Macy's, Levi's, Sofi Stadium, & Six Flags leverage digital signage to drive guest / shopper engagement to monetize the assets.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Android Kiosk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Android Kiosk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Android Kiosk software enables Android devices to be used as public access terminals for browsing, feedback submission, online ordering, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Signage software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Signage tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Signage software allows for the creation, scheduling, and distribution of multimedia signs, advertisements, and informational content. This type of software is suited for hotels, casinos, hospitality services, airports, shopping malls, corporate real estate managers, and any other entity that seeks digital advertisements or information boards. Digital Signage software is related to Kiosk software, Marketing Automation software, and Public Relations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top iPad Kiosk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of iPad Kiosk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: iPad Kiosk software enables iPads to be used as public access terminals for browsing, feedback submission, online ordering, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Order Entry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Order Entry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Order Entry software automates the entry, processing and management of sales orders across multiple channels, including: phone, mail order, retail and internet purchases. They also offer category specific feature sets for specific retail sectors such as: cellular/wireless, electronics, furniture, appliance, gifts, pharmacy front stores and music stores. Order Entry applications typically offer real-time integration with inventory control, order management, payment processing, marketing and customer relationship management, helping to optimize costs and increase efficiency. Order Entry software is related to eCommerce software and Order Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Retail Management systems on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Retail Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Retail Management Systems software manages financial reporting, accounting, and operations of retail stores by integrating core business processes such as point of sale (POS), customer relationship management (CRM), inventory management, accounting, human resources, marketing and eCommerce. By implementing a Retail Management System, organizations can increase sales, decrease costs, and maximize their competitive advantage. These applications facilitate the distribution of key data throughout an enterprise and provide the infrastructure for accurate sales reporting and revenue forecasting.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Ticketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Ticketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Ticketing software manages and automates online, kiosk, and box office ticketing for special events, theaters, parks, festivals, fairs, travel, and other activities. These applications help manage seat selections, event management, exhibitor data, performer assignments and locations, as well as online and onsite payment processing. Ticketing solutions also often integrate other business processes such as inventory control, transaction control, fulfillment history and sales tracking. Ticketing software is related to Event software, Registration software and Kiosk software.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Mend is the Leading Telehealth, Automated Patient Payments, & Patient Engagement Platform. Reduce no-show rates & engage more patients.
related_products.features:
Best for 11+ Provider Groups

Full Patient Engagement Suite, Telehealth & Complete Digital Patient Management: Automated Patient Payments, Appointment Reminders, AI-Predicted No Shows, Enhanced Virtual Waiting Room, Patient Self-Scheduling & Digital Forms. #1 Rated Support & Custom Workflows. 

Mend Has 98.3% Engagement, 99.85% Video Connection, & Single Digit No-Show Rates.

Mend Has Automation Technology To Integrate With Any EHR, PMS, or Other Systems. Perfect Fit For Large Provider Groups.

related_products.short_desc: Send secure intake and consent forms privately to your clients. HIPAA compliant, e-signature support, online booking and payment
related_products.features:
IntakeQ provides beautiful and secure electronic intake forms for health professionals, enabling them to offer an amazing onboarding experience, while also optimizing and streamlining the intake process.

As a bonus, IntakeQ also offers powerful practice management features, including scheduling, payment, appointment reminders, secure messaging, telehealth, invoicing and insurance billing.

Affordable pricing, 14-day free trial, no credit card required, no software to install.

related_products.short_desc: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves.
related_products.features: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves. And we're still leading! Let us show you what you should expect from an integrated, patient acquisition and engagement solution!  As the individual practices we started out serving have grown, we've added specialized features for multi-unit operations. We now support many of the nation's largest health systems and retail-based networks.

related_products.short_desc: More time for consultations. Happier clients. Less effort. vcita: HIPAA compliant software designed for your practice. Free Trial!
related_products.features: Nurture your patient relationships with a powerful HIPAA complient CRM app by vcita. Store, manage and label your leads, contacts and patients in one centralized online hub. Get a birds-eye view of your patients' history appointments, payments, invoices, documents and conversations. Have all the information handy wherever you are and whenever you need it with a friendly mobile app and easily collaborate with your team, assigning patients, appointments and incoming requests to staff members.

related_products.short_desc: Engage your patients using HIPAA-compliant patient portal that provides secure messaging and automated reminder system.
related_products.features: Engage your patients using HIPAA-compliant patient portal that gives access to personal health records, provides real-time patient data updates, secure messaging, and automated reminder system.

related_products.short_desc: Our easy-to-use solution helps you engage and connect with your patients and deliver the best virtual care.
related_products.features: PatientPop combines telehealth, communications, and patient intake in a streamlined platform to help you deliver quality care and build lasting relationships with your patients. Combined with Practice Growth Foundation, our solution makes it easy for you to attract patients and retain them for life. We also integrate with the most widely used EMRs to help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best modern experience.

related_products.short_desc: Our EHR and all-in-one solutions for all practice sizes include patient engagement tools like Telehealth, Patient Portal and more.
related_products.features: ModMed? offers a suite of Patient Engagement tools for practices of all sizes to help increase patient loyalty and add convenience for the following medical specialties: Allergy, Dermatology, ENT, GI, OBGYN, Ophthalmology, Orthopedics, Pain Management, Plastic Surgery, Podiatry and Urology. Patient engagement tools include Telehealth, Patient Portal, Patient Self-Scheduling, ModMed Kiosk, Patient Reminders and Patient Surveys.

related_products.short_desc: Cerner Ambulatory supports more than 55 specialties by delivering integrated clinical and financial solutions and services.
related_products.features: Cerner's PowerChart Ambulatory EHR ensures the right clinicians have the right information at the right time and place to make the best possible decisions. We believe that with information technology and coordination, health care becomes safer, more effective and available to communities worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: It is not only a comprehensive PM/EMR system, but a robust marketing and patient acquisition software.
related_products.features:
PatientNow provides comprehensive EMR, practice management, and patient engagement software in the elective medical industry. Streamline practice operations, improve efficiency, and drive revenue with one software partner.  
Paperless Office
Electronic Charting
Lab Interface
Patient Portal
Scheduling & Booking
Memberships & Loyalty Rewards

And More

Users can keep their existing fax numbers or get new numbers from Medsender with their preferred area codes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospital Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Case Management software is used to manage and track patients within the healthcare and social services professions. This type of software is often used by social service agencies, non-profits, hospitals, and mental health clinics, to track, monitor, and report on the status of long and short term patients. Patient Case Management software is related to Mental Health software, Human Services software and Association Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.description: Patient Management software incorporates solutions for bed availability management, patient tracking throughout the facility, be it a hospital or a smaller healthcare clinic, and patient queue management for various healthcare organizations. For related software solutions see Patient Case management software and Healthcare Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Portal software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Portal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Portal software makes it possible for healthcare providers and hospitals to securely connect and communicate with patients online. With Patient Portal software, your patients can take care of their billing and invoicing, view their electronic health records and fill out important intake and insurance forms. Looking for other innovative software to manage your medical practice? Check out Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software, and Patient Management software.
